mapper.select: SELECT fa.*, fs.img FROM ftArticle fa INNER JOIN match_participant mp ON fa.id = mp.matchId INNER JOIN football_stadium fs ON fa.id=fs.id WHERE mp.memberId = #{memberId} AND mp.type ='풋살' AND fa.playDate < NOW() ORDER BY fa.playDate DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT sa.*, ss.img FROM scArticle sa INNER JOIN match_participant mp ON sa.id = mp.matchId INNER JOIN soccer_stadium ss ON sa.id = ss.id WHERE mp.memberId = #{memberId} AND mp.type = '축구' AND sa.playDate < NOW() ORDER BY sa.playDate DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET goodReactionPoint = goodReactionPoint + 1 WHERE id = #{relId}
UPDATE article SET goodReactionPoint = goodReactionPoint - 1 WHERE id = #{relId}
